title: How to avoid plagiarism in turnitin for technical papers - Quora

response.answer_text: Before you find out how to avoid plagiarism using Turnitin, it’s worth to know what it is and how it works. It’s a professional anti-plagiarism tool that helps to detect the amount of originality or similarity to other apers in your own content. It works the same way as other plagiarism-prevention programs do. Although it’s a very useful tool, there were lots of cases when students tried to cheat the system and beat Turnitin.  Here are some of the best ways that students used to cheat Turnitin and avoid plagiarism: Provide proper references to all of the sources you’ve used in your research.This means that all material taken from another person’s work should be quoted and accurately cited. In such a way no plagiarism checking tools will be able to detect any piracy and you won’t feel guilty for stealing somebody’s words. 2. Check your content for plagiarism on your own using another anti-plagiarism software before you use Turnitin. Since this program saves all of the documents you’ve uploaded previously, there’s a chance that you might even plagiarize yourself, so to avoid that, better utilize a couple of free plagiarism checkers to beat Turnitin.  3. Paraphrase. This is one of the most effective ways to avoid piracy but bear in mind that replacing only a few words with their synonyms will be still considered as an act of stealing somebody’s words. 4. Ask for the professional help from experts providing online writing services. That is one of the easiest and fastest ways to get the job done, nevertheless, it’s not a safe one. Your professor who is likely to know your writing style well may recognize that the work wasn’t completed or rephrased by you. That’s why it’s better to do it on your own or ask somebody who is qualified enough to help you. 5. Change the letters in some words. This way is one of the riskiest ones so I wouldn’t recommend you to do that.

Writing a technical paper (or any other kind) requires gathering information and proper formatting, so it means you ought to know how to reduce plagiarism percentage to make your work stronger and more unique. Plagiarism is considered to be a serious intellectual and educational violation and it can ruin your reputation as a writer and lead to the loss of believability.  Here are some effective tips to avoid plagiarism: Text comprehension:avoid content copy-pasting, express the idea in your own words;understand the meaning of information you’ve found in order to paraphrase properly;look for some good paraphrasing examples.2. Quotations: always quote somebody’s paper to show that you haven’t simply stolen other person’s words. 3. Choose what parts of your work should be cited: any words, phrases, passages or ideas taken from somebody’s paper must include citations;if you’re using material from your previous works, you also should cite them;citation applies to facts and common facts as well.4. Manage your citations by using specific citation software. 5. Use plagiarism-checking programs.
